item.description: Visual Code Setup visual code with a font with programming ligatures Install manualy or on linux First you will need a font with ligatures. font fira code github https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode Install from github or package manager. Mac os install using homebrew brew tap caskroom/fonts brew cask install font-fira-code Visual code setup In the menu goto File > Preferences > User Settings Add below to the settings.json file { "editor.fontFamily": "Fira Code", "editor.
